ampcb.name: AMP (Cherry Blast)
ampcb.description: Half-diet AMP flavor regionally released in 2015.

ampsl.name: AMP (Strawberry Limeade)
ampsl.description: AMP flavor regionally released in 2015 and discontinued in 2021.

ccherry.name: Citrus Cherry
ccherry.description: *Not to be confused with Game Fuel (Citrus Cherry).* Half-diet flavor released regionally in 2014. Made a national LTO release in 2016 and 2018.

nz_cred.name: Code Red (NZ)
nz_cred.description: Citrus-berry-cola flavor released to New Zealand in 2009. Made with real sugar.

cyclone.name: Cyclone
cyclone.description: Citrus punch fountain flavor released in 2019 to Speedway gas stations.

dcred.name: Diet Code Red
dcred.description: Sugar-free cherry flavor nationally released in 2002 and is currently a regional offering.

gblast.name: Game Blast
gblast.description: Citrus-cherry flavor released to Sweden in 2015 and discontinued in 2020.

gfccherry.name: Game Fuel (Citrus Cherry)
gfccherry.description: Game Fuel flavor released in 2007 and plenty of years following as an LTO, with the last production run of the full-sugar recipe being in 2015.

gfccburst.name: GAME FUEL (Charged Cherry Burst)
gfccburst.description: GAME FUEL Charged flavor released in 2019.

hbrew.name: Holiday Brew
hbrew.description: Cherry and citrus flavor made from a mixture of Code Red and Original DEW. Released for a limited time in 2017.

sblast.name: Sangrita Blast
sblast.description: Citrus punch flavor released to US Taco Bell locations from 2013-2017 with a limited release to store shelves nationally in 2015.

sflare.name: Solar Flare
sflare.description: Tropical punch fountain flavor released to US 7-Eleven locations in 2014, with availability slowly diminishing beginning in 2015. Currently offered at extremely few 7-Eleven locations.

sshock.name: Southern Shock
sshock.description: Tropical punch fountain flavor released to Bojangles locations in 2020.
